text: Fighting Back is a 1982 American action thriller movie directed by Lewis Teague and starring Tom Skerritt, Patti LuPone, Michael Sarrazin, Yaphet Kotto, David Rasche, Lewis Van Bergen, Earle Hyman, Ted Ross, Allan Graf. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1982 action movies Category:1982 thriller movies Category:American action thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Lewis Teague Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Philadelphia
title: Fighting Back
